ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENT
ack.p: We thank S. Reznik and D. Kucherov for assistance with statistical analysis of the data.

This study was supported by the Ministry of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology (MEXT) of Japan via the 21st Century COE Program at Kyoto University and by MEXT KAKENHI grants no. 26117732 and 25221107.
